title: Wijnaldum winner floors City
shortdesc: Liverpool capped a progressive 2016 with a 1-0 victory over Man City and reduced the gap to Chelsea back to six points.

shortdesc: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp is happy to keep hanging on to the coat-tails of Chelsea after beating Manchester City.

shortdesc: Watch highlights as Liverpool closed the gap on Chelsea to six points with a 1-0 win over Manchester City.

title: Why Liverpool can do it
shortdesc: Five reasons why Jurgen Klopp’s Liverpool can end the club’s long wait for a league title.

title: Liverpool 1-0 Man City recap
shortdesc: Follow live updates as Liverpool host Man City in the Premier League. Watch in-game clips and match highlights in the Football Score Centre.

title: Pep: We controlled game
shortdesc: Pep Guardiola believes Manchester City controlled the game despite being beaten 1-0 by Liverpool at Anfield.

shortdesc: Reaction from all Saturday's games in the Premier League. See goals and highlights on mobile.

title: Pep: City still no Liverpool
shortdesc: Pep Guardiola has admitted that Manchester City still cannot compare with Liverpool or Manchester United in terms of history and success.

title: Transfer Centre
shortdesc: The latest deals and gossip including news on Anthony Martial, Memphis Depay, Lee Grant and Marco van Ginkel.

title: Mane keen to cause City problems
shortdesc: Liverpool forward Sadio Mane caused problems for Pep Guardiola before and he will be hoping to do the same on New Year's Eve.

title: Could Chelsea cracks appear?
shortdesc: After winning 12 games on the trot, there aren't too many reasons for Chelsea's title rivals to be cheerful at present.

shortdesc: Jurgen Klopp believes Manchester City have made improvements this season under Pep Guardiola.

title: Klopp: Pep history irrelevant
shortdesc: Jurgen Klopp insists history will count for nothing when Liverpool take on Manchester City on New Year's Eve.

title: Mane in Senegal's ACN squad
shortdesc: Liverpool's Sadio Mane is one of five English-based players named in Senegal's squad for the African Cup of Nations.
